text:
Saga Healthcare IT currently seeking to fill roles for a PM and Software Engineer.

More here: https://saga.healthcare/careers

Software Engineer, Data Integration 5+ years experience with software development and processes. Core competencies: Expertise in one or more prgramming languages (Java, PHP, .NET, etc) HL7, FHIR, CDA Code Systems: RxNorm, Snomed CT, ICD HIPPA Compliance DICOM, RIS and Medical Imaging a plus Experience with one or more interface engines (Mirth Connect, Corepoint, Rhapsody, etc)

Project Manager 5+ years experience in managing information technology projects. Core competencies: Health information technology experience a plus. Certification a plus (PMP, CAPM, PMI-ACP, etc.) HIPPA Compliance
